downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 White Paper: Country-Specific Update for Italy
downloadDescription: This white paper describes the country-specific update that was released for Italy in Cumulative Update 2 (CU–2) for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
detailsSection:
In accordance with Italian legislation, legal entities must generate and submit a Modello 770 report electronically to the Italian government. You must generate the Modello 770 report electronically and export the report as an ASCII file to the Italian Revenue Agency website.

This paper describes the following information:
  • Setting up withholding tax and address information to generate the Modello 770 report
  • Creating and exporting the Modello 770 report as an ASCII file
  • Forms
  • Modified forms


For more information about the hotfix download, see Microsoft Knowledge Base article 2606916. For more information about other features that apply to Italy, refer to the Help. Information that is specific to Italy includes (ITA) in the title.
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
